content: for my crochet coaster set i ve used 15 g of this mercerized giza cotton turquoise 50g= 125m/ 1 76oz= 136 yards and a 3 mm hook the final dimensions -first crochet coaster circumference of 9 cm/ 3 5 inches -the second crochet coaster a circumference of 10 5 cm/ 4 inches the pattern uses us crochet terminology
